caseTitle: Shuhada Forum, Balochistan through its Patron in Chief, Nawabzada Jamal Raisani, Quetta Cantt and others v. Justice (R) Jawwad S. Khawaja and others
authorJudge: (1) Mr. Justice Sardar Tariq Masood (2) Mr. Justice Amin-Ud-Din Khan (3) Mr. Justice Muhammad Ali Mazhar (4) Mr. Justice Syed Hasan Azhar Rizvi (5) Ms. Justice Mussarat Hilali (6) Mr. Justice Irfan Saadat Khan
tagline: First Interlocutory Order in Intra Court Appeals filed under Section 5 of the Supreme Court (Practice and Procedure) Act, 2023 to challenge impugned Order dated 23.10.2023 passed by the learned bench of Supreme Court in the Constitution Petition Nos.24, 25, 26, 27, 28, 30 & 35 of 2023, whereby clause (d) of sub-section (1) of Section 2 of the Pakistan Army Act, 1952 (in both of its sub clauses (i) & (ii)) and sub-section (4) of Section 59 of the said Act were  declared ultra vires the Constitution.
